urls.title: Guardian coverage of flood defences
urls.description: Today The Guardian has reported on the condition of flood defences across England, stating that thousands of people and businesses are ‚Äòat risk from ruined assets‚Äô. However, the article did not recognise that when defences are listed as below the required condition it does not necessarily mean that they have structurally failed, or that performance in a flood is compromised.
